definition: any of various types of fold formed by doubling fabric back upon itself and then pressing or stitching into shape, weave into plaits
details:
noun
- any of various types of fold formed by doubling fabric back upon itself and then pressing or stitching into shape
= synonyms: pleat
- a hairdo formed by braiding or twisting the hair
= synonyms: twist
verb
- weave into plaits
= example: weave into plaits
- make by braiding or interlacing
= synonyms: braid
